Title: Text Page with Illuminated Chapter Headings for Chapters 111 and 112
Medium: ink and pigments on cream laid paper
Description: This text page from Walters manuscript W.567 has two illuminated chapter headings written in Riqa' script in red ink on a gold ground for chapter 111 (Surat al-lahab) and chapter 112 (Surat al-ilkhas).
Keywords: Koran; Qur`an; Arabic; Islamic; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Headpiece; Illumination; Manuscript; Iran; Scripture
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Iranian
